p: The geographic distribution of the OHFV appears restricted to western Siberia (Kharitonova and Leonov 1985) in Omsk, Novosibirsk, Kurgan, and Tyumen oblasts. The main hosts of OHFV are rodents and in particular the nonâ€“native muskrat ( Ondatra zibethica) as a natural OHFV reservoir. Muskrat was imported to Siberia from Canada in the 1920s and the virus finds a particular receptive host to replicate and spread efficiently.
